title: Need For Seat

overview.longDescription: Need for Seat is a two-player competitive arcade game housed in a custom-built cabinet that transforms the mundane act of moving a chair into an absurdist racing experience. Players move four chair-leg-shaped inputs to "walk" their on-screen chair across a room to help a man in need of seat. The project merges digital game design with physical computing and furniture-scale fabrication, creating an installation that invites playful competition and incites a Need For Seat!

metadata.client: Personal Project in collaboration with Marven Ma and Sana Alimohamed
